title: An evening of ‘Culture & Festivity’ brings together Pakistani, Italian fashion trends
description: ZUBAIR QURESHI The outgoing Ambassador of Italy, Andreas Ferrarese with his spouse Albana Planeja hosted an evening marked by couture, culture and festivity at the site of the new embassy. They had hosted the event to pay their parting regards to the diplomats, Pakistani friends including parliamentarians, government officials, media and civil society. Some popular […]

title: Dr. Nadeem Jan holds special  meeting with UAE Health Minister
description: Federal Minister of Health Dr. Nadeem Jan had a special meeting with the Minister of Health of the United Arab Emirates, Abdul Rahman bin Muhammad Al Awais, in Dubai on the sidelines of COP 28 UN Climate change summit. Dr. Nadeem Jan congratulated his counterpart on the successful conduct of COP 28. Dr. Nadeem Jan […]

title: Over 8,40,000 people’s data entered through ‘Hotel Eye’ software
description: Following the special directives of Islamabad Capital City Police Officer (ICCPO) Dr Akbar Nasir Khan, the Safe City Islamabad is playing an effective role in the prevention of crimes and effective security in the federal capital. According to the details, the Islamabad Capital Police “Hotel Eye” software is fully operational and working effectively and […]

title: Sindhi Cultural Day celebrated with enthusiasm by Soormiyun at PNCA
description: Soormiyun, a cultural organization, in collaboration with Sindh Cultural Department and Takori hosted a vibrant and colorful celebration of Sindhi Cultural Day at the Pakistan National Council of Arts (PNCA) in Islamabad. The event, held here yesterday, aimed to showcase the rich heritage of Sindhi culture while emphasizing the importance of cultural harmony and empowering […]

title: Pakistan’s first Sufi Opera singer Saira Peter gives a soulful performance at PNCA
description: Zubair Qureshi Saira Peter, a British-Pakistani soprano (female opera singer) recognized as Pakistan’s first Sufi Opera singer, mesmerized the audience with a soulful performance in a musical held at the Pakistan National Council of the Arts (PNCA). Federal Minister for National Heritage and Culture, Syed Jamal Shah was the chief guest on the occasion. Prominent […]

title: IESCO electricity dues collection campaign continues
description: The amount of each unit of electricity used will be recovered from defaulters. Dues of more than 863 million has been collected from 48619 running and dead defaulters. IESCO spokesperson Asim Nazir Raja. Timely payment of electricity bills is the moral and national responsibility of consumers and along with timely collection of electricity dues from […]

title: RDA issues notices to four illegal housing schemes
description: The Rawalpindi Development Authority (RDA) on the directives of the Director General (DG), Muhammad Saif Anwar Jappa, has issued notices to four illegal housing schemes namely High Life City, SSJ Marketing, Wah Hills and Amman Scheme. According to the statement issued by the RDA spokesman on Sunday, the Metropolitan Planning and Traffic Engineering (MP&TE) […]

title: Two-day Capacity Building Workshop on ‘Journalism  in the Digital Age’
description: As the landscape of journalism evolves with the rapid advancements in technology, journalism stands at the intersection of tradition and innovation. It becomes imperative for journalists to adapt and harness the potential of mobile journalism and digital skills. Mobile journalism has emerged as a transformative force in the field, providing journalists with unprecedented flexibility and […]

title: Online fraudster apprehended
description: The Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) Cyber Crime Circle on Sunday apprehended an accused, Muhammad Amin, involved in online fraud and cheating. Acting on a tip-off, the FIA conducted a raid and arrested Amin from Rawalpindi. The accused allegedly contacted unsuspecting citizens by impersonating a close relative and concocted stories about being in an accidental situation. […]

title: Society for Promotion of Science organized  sries of seminars
description: The Society for Promotion of Science organized a series of two seminars delivered by Prof. Dr. Asghar Qadir (HI,SI), who is a renowned mathematical physicist, cosmologist and mathematician of Pakistan. He has some seminal contributions in general relativity, cosmology and quantum mechanics. He received his PhD in 1971 under the supervision of Nobel laureate Roger […]

title: Faisal Malik assures support to KTPL 3
description: KARACHI: Guest of honor Chairman & CEO Pakistan Observer Mr. Faisal Zahid Malik with legendary cricketers Sadiq Muhammad, Mushtaq Muhammad, Haroon Rasheed and Tauseef Ahmed at the opening ceremony of KTPL season 3. — Photo by: Nauman The Karachi Tapeball Premier League (KTPL) season 3, inaugurated by the Governor Sindh Kamran Khan Tessori at Dha […]

title: Australia announce Pat Cummins-led squad for first Test against Pakistan
description: Australia announced on Sunday their 14-man squad which will play in the first Test against Pakistan in the three-match home series. The squad, which is being led by World Cup winning skipper Pat Cummins, will play the first Test on December 14 to 18 at the Perth Stadium. Australian opener David Warner, who said that […]

title: Italy and Spain to meet in Euro 2024 group stage
description: Reigning champions Italy were placed in the same group as Spain in Saturday’s draw for Euro 2024, while France will come up against the Netherlands and England avoided any of the toughest op-ponents. Gareth Southgate’s much-fancied England side will meet Slovenia, Denmark and Serbia, with hosts Germany taking on Scotland in the tournament’s opening game […]

title: ‘Foreign terrorists’ behind deadly Philippine bombing, officials say
description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr condemned a deadly bombing on Sunday, blaming “foreign terrorists”, as police and the military strengthened security in the country’s south and around the capital Manila. At least four people were killed and at least 50 injured after a bomb exploded during a morning Catholic Mass in a university gymnasium in […]

title: Heavy snow paralyses parts of southern Germany
description: Heavy snowfall brought chaos to parts of southern Germany on Saturday, with air and rail traffic blocked in the Bavarian state capital of Munich. The heavy snowfall prompted an all-day cancellation of flights and long-distance trains out of Munich, with Christmas markets closed, some ski lifts unable to run and a football match called off […]

title: Japan issues tsunami alert as 7.3 magnitude earth quake hits Philippines
description: An earthquake of at least 7.3 magnitude struck Mindanao in the southern Philippines late Saturday, prompting evacuation orders and tsunami warnings (of waves) one metre (3 feet) or higher for Japan. The waves might hit the Philippines by mid-night (1600 GMT) and linger for several hours, according to the Philippine Seismology Agency Phivolcs. According to […]

title: Tens of thousands of pro Palestinian supporters stage events across Britain
description: Tens of thousands of people across the UK held protests on Saturday as part of a “Day of Action” against the resumption of Israel’s renewed attack on Gaza following a seven-day pause in fighting, organizers said. “Israel’s decision to resume its bombardment of Gaza flies in the face of international law, which prohibits collective punishment […]

title: India uses torture systematically to disable Kashmiris
description: As the world observes International Day of Persons with Disabilities, today, India continues to use torture systematically to disable the people of occupied Jammu and Kashmir. A report released by Kashmir Media Service on the occasion of International Day of Persons with Disabilities, today, said brutal and inhuman torture techniques, employed by Indian troops, paramilitary […]

title: Kashmir’s EU Week to begin in Brussels on Tuesday
description: Kashmir Council Europe (KC-EU) will organize the Kashmir’s EU Week from December 5 to December 15, 2023 in the European Headquarters, Brussels. According to Kashmir Media Service, this was announced by Chairman of Kashmir Council Europe Ali Raza Syed in a statement in Brussels, today. The events include seminars, discussions, a media conference and a […]

title: Vikar Wani cautions IIOJK people against BJP’s divisive tactics
description: The President of Indian National Congress chapter in Indian illegally occupied Jammu and Kashmir, Vikar Rasool Wani, has cautioned the people of Indian illegally occupied Jammu and Kashmir against the divisive tactics of the Bharatiya Janata Party. title: Pakistan Women secure first ever T20I victory against New Zealand Women
description: DUNEDIN – Pakistan women created history on Sunday, defeating New Zealand women by seven wickets in the first T20I at the University of Otago Oval. This marked the first win for the Pakistan women’s team over the New Zealand women – also known as White Ferns – in the T20I format. Chasing 128 to win, […]

title: Smog/fog update for Lahore, Punjab
description: LAHORE – The Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD) has forecast mainly cold and dry weather for Lahore and most parts of Punjab during the next couple of days. According to the synoptic situation, continental air prevails over most parts of Pakistan. A shallow trough is present over northern parts of the country. Under these conditions, cold […]

title: Weather outlook of Karachi, Sindh; fog sets in plains
description: KARACHI – The Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD) has forecast mainly dry weather across Sindh including Karachi and Hyderabad during the next two days. According to the synoptic situation, continental air prevails over most parts of Pakistan. A shallow trough is present over northern parts of the country. Under these conditions, mainly dry weather is expected […]

title: Islamabad, Pakistan weather update; fog prevails in plains
description: ISLAMABAD – The Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD) has forecast mainly cold and dry weather for Islamabad, Rawalpindi and most parts of Pakistan during the next two days. According to the synoptic situation, continental air prevails over most parts of Pakistan. A shallow trough is present over northern parts of the country. Under these conditions, mainly […]

title: Cement dispatches drop by 2.12pc in November 2023
description: LAHORE – Cement dispatches declined by 2.12 per cent in November 2023. Total cement dispatches during Nov 2023 were 3.924 million tons against 4.009 Million tons during the same month of the last fiscal year. According to the data released by All Pakistan Cement Manufacturers Association, local cement dispatches during last month were 3.262 million […]

title: Currency exchange rates in Pakistan today – December 3, 2023
description: KARACHI – The exchange rate for one US Dollar against Pakistani Rupees was recorded at Rs 284.47 in the local and open market, with a selling rate of Rs 284.97 on Sunday, December 3, 2023. Note: Exchange rates can vary based on the location and the Exchange Company or bank involved in the transaction. Below are […]

description: KARACHI – The gold rate of 24-karat is being traded at PKR 219,800 on Sunday, December 3, 2023.
